_header: When earth hath earth I-won with woe
Note: For a variant of this version see 1167; for the B version see 1170 and 6369; for the C version see 1171. See also 6293.
Subjects: transitoriness, of world; vanity, against worldly

BLHar913.First Lines:
Whan erþ haþ erþ iwonne wiþ wowþan
                    erþ nim hir inow…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…for he is king of blis and mon of moch medeþat
                    deliþ þe dai fram niȝt and leuiþ lif and dede

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Erþe toc of erþe erþe wyþ wohErþe
                    oþer erþe to þe erþe drohErþe leyde erþe in
                    erþene þrohþo heuede erþe of erþe erþe
                    ynoh
